title: Kth Largest Element
algorithmDescription: Find kth largest element in unsorted array using heap or quick select
detailedDescription: Find the kth largest element in an unsorted array. Input: First line has n and k. Second line has n space-separated integers. Output: The kth largest element. Use min-heap of size k for O(n log k) solution, or quick select for O(n) average.
hints: Min-heap approach: maintain heap of size k with k largest elements
For each element, if > heap root and heap size = k, replace root
Quick select is O(n) average but more complex
commonMistakes: Sorting entire array (O(n log n) not optimal)
Confusing kth largest with kth smallest
solutionApproach: Use min-heap of size k. Iterate through array: add element to heap. If heap size > k, remove minimum. After processing all elements, heap root is kth largest.
testCaseCriteria: Must efficiently find kth largest. Should handle duplicates. Better than O(n log n) time complexity.
